song_lyrics: Kilkat uṭhī chalat dhyāy, parat bhūmi laṭpaṭāy,
Dhāy mātu god let, Dashrathkī raniyā... ° 1
Anchal raj ang zārī, vividh bhāti karī dulār;
Tan man dhan vārī ḍārī, bolat mṛudu bachaniyā... ° 2
Modak mevā rasāl, manmānai so lehu lāl;
Aur lehu ruchi pān, kanchan zunzuniyā... ° 3
Bidrumse lalit adhar, bolat mukh bachan madhur;
Nāsā aru adhar bīch, laṭkat laṭkaniyā... ° 4
Sukhmāke Shiv kambu, grīv tīnrekh ruchir;
Vadan suchir kuṭil chikur, mand-mand hasaniyā... ° 5
Bhrūkuti tribhangī ang, kachhanī kachhe kaṭi niṣhang;
Ad‍bhut chhabi ati apār, ko kavi jo barṇe pār;
Kahī na sakat Sheṣh jāke, sahasra dou rasaniyā... ° 7
Tulsīdās ati ānand, nirakhī ke mukhārvind;
Raghuvar ke chhabi samān, Raghuvar chhabi baniyā... ° 8
title: Ṭhumak chalat Rāmchandra bājat payjaniyā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-294: Tulsidas

Category: Anya Hindi Pad
